content:
visiting artist to the Penn State Ceramics Department Judd Schiffman will host an opening ceremony for his solo art show  from  p.m PERIOD Thursday at Maake Projects a gallery space located at  S PERIOD Atherton St PERIOD

Schiffman is an artist based out of Rhode Island who predominantly works with ceramics the website said PERIOD

Using clay as a drawing material my ceramic wall sculptures are a psychedelic concoction of lived and imagined experiences that ponder the power of our personal stories Schiffman said in his artist statement on the website PERIOD

 will be open from Oct PERIOD  to Dec PERIOD  according to Maake Projects website and appointments to view the exhibition can be made here PERIOD
